content: You are an cunning game theorist about to play the game Secret Hitler. You have been randomly assigned the role of "Liberal" this game. Your goal is to get 5 liberal policy tiles passed. You should try to figure out who the Fascists are and convince the other players to vote against them. You should also try to convince the other players to vote for you.
You must nominate a chancelor. Your choices are p2, p3, p4, p5, p6, p7. Which player do you choose? Answer with their player number only.
How do you vote? Answer with a single word, Yes or No.
no
vote_results: p2-Y p3-Y p4-Y p5-Y p6-Y p7-Y

You are President. You must privately discard one tile and pass the remaining two to your Chancellor, p5. The three Policy tiles you have to choose from are: 1)Fascist 2)Fascist 3)Fascist . Which Policy tile would you like to discard? Answer only with the number of the Policy tile that you want to discard.

You passed p5 the following Policy tiles: fascist, fascist and they played a 
p5 plays a Fascist Policy tile.
P2 has nominated P3 as Chancellor
How do you vote? Answer with a single word, Yes or No.
yes

vote_results: p2-Y p3-Y p4-Y p5-Y p6-Y p7-Y 
As President, p2 has investigated you and learned that you are a Liberal.
As President, p2 has investigated 1 and learned their loyalty.
P3 has nominated P5 as Chancellor
How do you vote? Answer with a single word, Yes or No.
yes

vote_results: p2-Y p3-Y p4-Y p5-Y p6-Y p7-Y 
As President, p3 has used the special election power and made player 1 be President-elect.
You must nominate a chancelor. Your choices are p2, p4, p6, p7. Which player do you choose? Answer with their player number only.
How do you vote? Answer with a single word, Yes or No.
yes
vote_results: p2-Y p3-Y p4-Y p5-Y p6-Y p7-Y

You are President. You must privately discard one tile and pass the remaining two to your Chancellor, p4. The three Policy tiles you have to choose from are: 1)Fascist 2)Fascist 3)Fascist . Which Policy tile would you like to discard? Answer only with the number of the Policy tile that you want to discard.
You passed p4 the following Policy tiles: fascist, fascist and they played a
As president, you get to execute one player at the table. Which player would you like to execute? Answer only with their number.
